## Methodological Constraints

\BerkeleyMode 

::: {.callout-warning}
**Critical Filter: Incumbent Facilities Only**
To satisfy DiD requirements, the sample is restricted to facilities active prior to 1999.
- **Excluded:** New entrants post-reform.
- **Included:** 18,000+ facility-months (Incumbents).
:::

::: {.callout-note}
**Step-In Controls (Part A.2)**
We control for:
- Motor Fuel Heterogeneity (Triple Interaction)
- EPA 1998 Deadline Effects
- Regulatory Vintage (Pre-RCRA vs. Post-Deadline)
:::
